title: The Bastion

fields.name: Vicious Defense (x1, Charge 150%):
fields.value: Target a player that is not you. You will attack and roleblock anyone who visits them tonight.

fields.name: Bulwark (x1, Charge 150%):
fields.value: Target a player. Anyone who non-Astrally attacks them will be redirected to attack you instead. Anyone who attacks you tonight and doesn't kill you will be crippled tomorrow Night, making them unable to attack.

fields.name: Injury (Passive):
fields.value: If you are attacked and survive, but the Attack Score was with 15% of your Defense Score, your Defense Power permanently drops by 0.1x.
